title: Have Questions?
faq: {{ faqCount:gt; 0:{{ faqCount; 1: FAQs; default: FAQs }}; default:FAQ; }}

whatIsThis.question: What is this?
whatIsThis.answer: This is a mini app for showing your Upwork's earnings. You can see your earnings yearly in bar chart. Also you can share your earnings with your friends.

howDoesItWork.question: How does it work?
howDoesItWork.answer: You need to export your earnings from Upwork as CSV file, then upload it here.

howCanIGetMyUpworkID.question: How can I get my Upwork ID?
howCanIGetMyUpworkID.answer: You can go to your profile, and check the address bar, it will look like this: https://www.upwork.com/freelancers/<id>. The <id> is your Upwork ID.

canIUseMyUsernameInsteadOfMyUpworkID.question: Can I use my username instead of my Upwork ID?
canIUseMyUsernameInsteadOfMyUpworkID.answer: Yes, you can use your username instead of your Upwork ID.

isTheAppNeedsToAccessMyUpworkAccount.question: Is the app needs to access my Upwork account?
isTheAppNeedsToAccessMyUpworkAccount.answer: No, the app does not need to access your Upwork account.

whereICanExportMyEarningsFromUpwork.question: Where I can export my earnings from Upwork?
whereICanExportMyEarningsFromUpwork.answer: You can go to Transactions and Invoices page, choose the date range, then download as CSV.

isItWillReadAllOfTheTransactionTypes.question: Is it will read all of the transaction types?
isItWillReadAllOfTheTransactionTypes.answer: No, the app only read the hourly and fixed price transactions, and the fee if any.

isMyUploadedCSVFileWillBeStored.question: Is my uploaded CSV file will be stored?
isMyUploadedCSVFileWillBeStored.answer: No, your uploaded CSV file will not be stored.

canIDeleteMyHistory.question: Can I delete my history?
canIDeleteMyHistory.answer: Yes, you can delete your history.

canISeeTheSourceCode.question: Can I see the source code?
canISeeTheSourceCode.answer: Yes, you can see the source code at {{ faqSourceCodeLink }}
